required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Randomized, Double Blind, Placebo-controlled Study to Evaluate the Efficacy of Lavandula Angustifolia Containing Nasal Spray Medical Device in Preventing Deterioration of COVID-19 in Symptomatic Patients
clinical_study.official_title: A Randomized, Double Blind, Placebo-controlled Study to Evaluate the Efficacy of Lavandula Angustifolia Containing Nasal Spray Medical Device in Preventing Deterioration of COVID-19 in Symptomatic Patients

brief_summary.textblock: A Nasal Spray device containing Dead Sea minerals and plant extracts, used to shorten duration and mitigate effects of Covid-19 infection in mild to moderate adult patients

detailed_description.textblock: A Nasal Spray device containing Dead Sea minerals and plant extracts, designed to incur a PPAR-alpha agonistic effect, used to shorten duration and mitigate effects of Covid-19 infection in mild to moderate adult patients

study_design_info.intervention_model_description: A control group is allocated a placebo solution

primary_outcome.measure: Covid-19 infection self-testing on days 2, 4 following testing positive on PCR test
primary_outcome.time_frame: First 7 days after testing positive on PCR test
primary_outcome.description: Testing using a self testing kit of the Quidel QuickView type

primary_outcome.time_frame: First 7 days after testing positive on PCR test
primary_outcome.description: Monitoring any disease symptoms reported by patient

arm_group.arm_group_label: Patients treated with actual device with actual solution
Patients treated with actual device with placebo solution

intervention.description: A Nasal Spray apparatus containing a liquid
intervention.arm_group_label: Patients treated with actual device with actual solution
Patients treated with actual device with placebo solution

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria: Having tested positive to Covid-19 on PCR test -
Exclusion Criteria: Pregnancy Low blood pressure On immune system suppressing medications
-
